name: Mateus Marques
role: Cybersecurity Analyst | Offensive Security | Master's in Physics

aboutme.text: I hold a bachelor's and a master's degree in Physics and currently study Systems Analysis and Development. I have an analytical mindset, am driven by challenges, and have a strong interest in cybersecurity. In my free time, I focus on studying offensive security through HackTheBox and CTFs, aiming for a Red Team career.

list.details: Volunteer researcher at the Polypus Labs Hacker Club. Collaborative projects, CVE analysis, and tools like Nmap, Wireshark, and BurpSuite. I produce technical reports and participate in discussions, deepening my knowledge in cybersecurity.

Web and mobile development using FastAPI, React.js, and PostgreSQL, as well as task automation with Python, Bash, and PowerShell. I also configure Linux servers and CI/CD pipelines with Docker and Jenkins.
